EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_EGG NYC 2018_New York_Q418.EGG post event attended email
EmailTemplate.subject: Dataiku EGG - bring scale to your analytics with Pivotal Greenplum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
It was great to meet you at Dataiku EGG!
I’d like to share some information about why Pivotal Greenplum is the database for all your analytical needs, from enterprise BI to machine learning.
First, here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/external-content/architecting-massively-scalable-self-service-analytics-platforms?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-agg-nyc-2018-new-york-q418]]> are slides from our data engineer, Shailesh Doshi’s presentation “Architecting Massively Scalable Self-Service Analytics Platforms.”
Next, this video <[[https://content.pivotal.io/youtube-uberflip/greenplum-for-faster-and-more-efficient-integrated-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-agg-nyc-2018-new-york-q418]]> provides a basic overview of how Pivotal Greenplum speeds up analytics on large data sets.
Check out our resources page <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/advanced-analytics#tabnav?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-agg-nyc-2018-new-york-q418]]> to view more information about use cases and features for advanced analytics on Greenplum. Get started today! Download a free copy of open-source Greenplum from our community site <[[https://greenplum.org/download/]]>.
Finally, if you have any specific questions you’d like to discuss with our data engineering team, you can request a follow up conversation here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-agg-nyc-2018-new-york-q418]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Software Team
